entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 9:28 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow this evening. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow ending in the morning then cloudy and 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
